唐提式保险（tontine insurance）由美国公平人寿在1868年首先推出。在该保险中，保费的一部分用于购买普通终身寿险，余下的部分 …
这些非正规金融包括放债人、供应商信用、多种形式的自助合作金融组织等,例如钱庄、信用合作社、非洲通坦蓄贷会 (Tontines)等。信用合作社运动始于19 世纪,很快扩展到.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 18th cent.: from French, named after Lorenzo Tonti (1630–95), a Neapolitan banker who started such a scheme to raise government loans in France (c.1653)

means.word_mean: 1. a form of life insurance whereby on the death or default of a participant his share is distributed to the remaining members

2. an annuity scheme wherein participants share certain benefits and on the death of any participant his benefits are redistributed among the remaining participants; can run for a fixed period of time or until the death of all but one participant
